original_title: Im Osten geht die Sonne auf
overview: Energie Cottbus, a small soccer club from the periphery of the republic, got promoted to the first division of the Bundesliga. Everyone was sure: They will get relegated immediately again! But everything turned out differently! The underdog club gave Cottbus - which was to many only known from scare stories about lack of prospects and unemployment â€“ joy, hope, and pride. The film looks behind the scenes and shares the thrill of the people for the finale of the season.
title: Im Osten geht die Sonne auf
